overview: Steamy fantasies come to life when Tony Dimarco’s vision of California Dreamin' 2 captures – in classic Falcon fashion - what happens when temperatures soar and stunning studs get rock hard, remove their clothing and turn their poolside sexual desires into reality. Mix equal parts sunshine, swim suits and sunscreen. Add a sparkling pool and eight hard and horny studs, to ratchet up the heat.
title: California Dreamin' 2
